content.html: Bit of an edge case. I have an #indieweb site (architecture diagram here vincentp.me/articles/2019/… ) I store my webmentions as JSON. When running locally and no internet. I can’t check if webmentions are rendering correctly (they are all abs. Links so I rewrite)
content.text:
Bit of an edge case. I have an #indieweb site (architecture diagram here vincentp.me/articles/2019/… )

I store my webmentions as JSON. When running locally and no internet. I can’t check if webmentions are rendering correctly (they are all abs. Links so I rewrite)
